title: The Dream Continues, Ain’t Jemima 6.19.20
itunes:title: The Dream Continues, Ain’t Jemima 6.19.20
description:
In episode 655, Jack and guest host Scam Goddess Laci Mosley are joined by comedian and The Male Gaze, Views From The Vista and Who's Your God? co-host Steve Hernandez to discuss the Supreme Court blocking Trump's attempt to end DACA, the Atlanta officer being charged with murder for shooting Rayshard Brooks, Quaker Oats finally scraping the Aunt Jemima brand, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. The Supreme Court Blocks Trump’s Attempt to End DACA—for Now
  2. Former Atlanta Officer Is Charged With Murder in Shooting of Rayshard Brooks
  3. Atlanta police call in sick to protest murder charge against officer who shot Rayshard Brooks
  4. Aunt Jemima brand to change name, remove image that Quaker says is 'based on a racial stereotype'
  5. Nancy Green, the original “Aunt Jemima”
  6. Revisiting Aunt Jemima: 'Slave in a Box'
  7. Aunt Jemima's Kitchen
  8. How Betye Saar Transformed Aunt Jemima into a Symbol of Black Power
  9. Aunt Jemima Is A Negative American Myth
  10. WATCH: Hanz - Ambivalence (feat. emawk)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
